Gives you +12 armour |

all_class_powers.content:
## Description Blow it all away | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **OmniBlast**
-You explode causing 1d8 damage to everything around you. You can choose the damage type of the blast. |

all_class_powers.name: Disaster
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Indiscriminate firepower. | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Seismic**
-The land around you shakes causing enemies to fall prone and take 1d4 damage. They fall on a failed reflex check of 6. This affect happens to everyone but you in a 3 block radius. | | 1 | 1 | **Meteor**
-Summon a asteroid that falls on an enemy. The meteor does 1d20 damage to everything in a 20m radius. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Seismic**
-The land around you shakes causing enemies to fall prone and take 1d4 damage. They fall on a failed reflex check of 6. This affect happens to everyone but you in a 3 block radius.

**Meteor**
-Summon a asteroid that falls on an enemy. The meteor does 1d20 damage to everything in a 20m radius.

all_class_powers.name: Elemental Control
all_class_powers.description: Take full control of the elements
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Take full control of the elements | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Terrain Molder**
-You can make walls out of your element of choice.
-Fire: Deal 1d4 damage and cause burning when moved through
-Water: Slow movement by half when move through
-Earth: Can not be moved through and have 6 armor
-Air: Can not be moved or attacked through. Invisible. | | 1 | 1 | **Tentacles!**
-You can summon tentacles made out of your element. Can grapple enemies from a distance and keep then restrained.
-Water: Deal 1d4 true damage
-Fire: Deal 1d4 and cause burning
-Air: Deal 1d4 and are invisible
-Earth: Deal 1d6 and have 6 armor
| | 1 | 1 | **Elemental Blasts**
-You can fire blasts of your element that deal 1d6 damage and a bonus effect. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Terrain Molder**
-You can make walls out of your element of choice.
-Fire: Deal 1d4 damage and cause burning when moved through
-Water: Slow movement by half when move through
-Earth: Can not be moved through and have 6 armor
-Air: Can not be moved or attacked through. Invisible.

**Tentacles!**
-You can summon tentacles made out of your element. Can grapple enemies from a distance and keep then restrained.
-Water: Deal 1d4 true damage
-Fire: Deal 1d4 and cause burning
-Air: Deal 1d4 and are invisible
-Earth: Deal 1d6 and have 6 armor

**Elemental Blasts**
-You can fire blasts of your element that deal 1d6 damage and a bonus effect.

-You can control plants in a 10m radius |

-You don't produce any sound unless you want to. |

Silence
-You don't produce any sound unless you want to.

-You can shove things in a 10m radius backwards 5m
-You can do a smarts check instead of a strength check for any strength check. | | 1 | 1 | **Telekinesis**
-You can lift up to 3 objects or people in a 15m radius around you. |

all_class_powers.name: Mind Control
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Take Control | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Taunt**
-You force an enemy to focus on you for a turn. This is a free action. | | 1 | 1 | **Puppeteer**
-You make an enemies movement actions. Once per turn. | | 1 | 1 | **Suggestion**
-You gain +4 to a persuasion check with a chance of being detected. The check is a smarts check of 8. |

-You make an enemies movement actions. Once per turn.

**Suggestion**
-You gain +4 to a persuasion check with a chance of being detected. The check is a smarts check of 8.

## Description Mini Me | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Clone 1**

all_sub_powers.text:

-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double disadvantage |

-Once per turn order, you can make a roll into a double disadvantage

all_class_powers.name: Teleport
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Swapping Places | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Teleport**
-You can teleport yourself 10m instead of taking a movement action. Does not need line of sight. | | 1 | 1 | **Exchange**
-You can swap the places of two people in line of sight not including yourself as an action. | | 1 | 1 | **Value Exchange**
-You can swap an item you are touching with one of less value as an action. They keep the other items speed. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Basic Teleport**
-You can teleport yourself 10m instead of taking a movement action. Does not need line of sight.

**Exchange**
-You can swap the places of two people in line of sight not including yourself as an action.

**Value Exchange**
-You can swap an item you are touching with one of less value as an action. They keep the other items speed.

all_class_powers.name: Cartoon
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Toon Force | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rubber and glue**
You take have immunity to blunt damage |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Rubber and glue**
You take have immunity to blunt damage

all_class_powers.name: Elemental Body
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Rock Solid | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Rock Body**
-You can turn you body into stone. This gives you 2 armor and makes your melee attack a 1d6 | | 1 | 1 | **Water Body**
-You have resistance to slashing and piercing damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Flame Body**
-Your unarmed melee attacks cause you to deal stacks of burning. You gain immunity to fire damage. | | 1 | 1 | **Wind Body**
-Your jump height doubles and you take no fall damage. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Rock Body**
-You can turn you body into stone. This gives you 2 armor and makes your melee attack a 1d6

**Water Body**
-You have resistance to slashing and piercing damage.

**Flame Body**
-Your unarmed melee attacks cause you to deal stacks of burning. You gain immunity to fire damage.

**Wind Body**
-Your jump height doubles and you take no fall damage.

all_class_powers.name: Feral
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Werewolves and Vampires | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Cursed one basic**
You can switch to a mutated form that is visibly identifiable as an action. In this form you gain +1 to Ref ,Str and Armor but gain -1 to all other stats. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Cursed one basic**
You can switch to a mutated form that is visibly identifiable as an action. In this form you gain +1 to Ref ,Str and Armor but gain -1 to all other stats.

all_class_powers.name: Kaiju
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Stomp Stomp Stomp | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Monstrous Size**
-You become twice the size of a human
-Your size gives you +2 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Gaint Size**
-You become four times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +4 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 3 | 1 | **Titanic Size**
-You become eight times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +8 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 4 | 1 | **Kaiju Size**
-You become sixteen times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +16 strength when working on things smaller than you. | | 2 | 1 | **Breath Weapon**
-Gain an elemental breath (fire/acid/frost/lightning/toxin/etc.)
-Range: 20m cone (40m at Titanic/Kaiju size)
-Damage: 1d8 + Size bonus (+2/+4/+8/+16)
-Cooldown: 3 turns
-Element adds extra effects (fire burns terrain, frost slows, lightning chains, acid ignores armor, etc.) | | 2 | 1 | **Tail Growth**
-Grow a powerful tail capable of sweeping attacks-Tail Strike: 1d6 + STR bonus
-Reach: 10m (scales with size)
-Can attack behind you or hit flanking enemies
-Tail Sweep (1/fight): Cone around you; enemies make Reflex 5 or fall prone | | 2 | 1 | **Wings**
-Grow functional kaiju wings-Monstrous/Giant: long jumps & gliding-Titanic: flight at 20m/turn-Kaiju: flight at 50m/turn-Wingbeat Shockwind: enemies within 10m must make Reflex 5 or be pushed 5m-Immune to fall damage | | 2 | 1 | **Spine Cannons**
-Dorsal spines fire biological artillery
-Range: 100m
-Damage: 1d10 (charge for +1d10 next turn)
-Modes: Piercing (ignore 6 armor), Explosive (5m radius, 1d6), Scatter (3 targets, 1d4 each)
-At Kaiju size, shots can damage armored vehicles | | 2 | 1 | **Electrical Organs**
-Develop massive bioelectric organs
-Shock Aura: 1 damage to enemies who touch you
-Lightning Pulse: 15m, 1d8 lightning, chains to 1 target (Reflex 5 to avoid)
-Nova Discharge (1/scene): 10m radius, 2d8 lightning, stun 1 turn (Durability 6 negates)
-Immune to electricity | | 2 | 1 | **Rage Evolution**
-You mutate as you take damage
-Each turn you are damaged, choose one: +1 STR, +1 DUR, +5m reach, +1 damage, +2 temporary armor
-Max +5 per category
-If you hit max during the fight, enter **Rage Form**: +1d8 damage to all attacks Movement doubled Breath cooldown = 1 turn (if you have it) Tail Sweep no cooldown (if you have tail)
-After fight: lose buffs and take -1 Social until calmed |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Monstrous Size**
-You become twice the size of a human
-Your size gives you +2 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Gaint Size**
-You become four times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +4 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Titanic Size**
-You become eight times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +8 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Kaiju Size**
-You become sixteen times the size of a human
-Your size gives you +16 strength when working on things smaller than you.

**Breath Weapon**
-Gain an elemental breath (fire/acid/frost/lightning/toxin/etc.)
-Range: 20m cone (40m at Titanic/Kaiju size)
-Damage: 1d8 + Size bonus (+2/+4/+8/+16)
-Cooldown: 3 turns
-Element adds extra effects (fire burns terrain, frost slows, lightning chains, acid ignores armor, etc.)

**Tail Growth**
-Grow a powerful tail capable of sweeping attacks-Tail Strike: 1d6 + STR bonus
-Reach: 10m (scales with size)
-Can attack behind you or hit flanking enemies
-Tail Sweep (1/fight): Cone around you; enemies make Reflex 5 or fall prone

**Wings**
-Grow functional kaiju wings-Monstrous/Giant: long jumps & gliding-Titanic: flight at 20m/turn-Kaiju: flight at 50m/turn-Wingbeat Shockwind: enemies within 10m must make Reflex 5 or be pushed 5m-Immune to fall damage

**Spine Cannons**
-Dorsal spines fire biological artillery
-Range: 100m
-Damage: 1d10 (charge for +1d10 next turn)
-Modes: Piercing (ignore 6 armor), Explosive (5m radius, 1d6), Scatter (3 targets, 1d4 each)
-At Kaiju size, shots can damage armored vehicles

**Electrical Organs**
-Develop massive bioelectric organs
-Shock Aura: 1 damage to enemies who touch you
-Lightning Pulse: 15m, 1d8 lightning, chains to 1 target (Reflex 5 to avoid)
-Nova Discharge (1/scene): 10m radius, 2d8 lightning, stun 1 turn (Durability 6 negates)
-Immune to electricity

**Rage Evolution**
-You mutate as you take damage
-Each turn you are damaged, choose one: +1 STR, +1 DUR, +5m reach, +1 damage, +2 temporary armor
-Max +5 per category 
-If you hit max during the fight, enter **Rage Form**: +1d8 damage to all attacks Movement doubled Breath cooldown = 1 turn (if you have it) Tail Sweep no cooldown (if you have tail)
-After fight: lose buffs and take -1 Social until calmed

all_class_powers.name: Mutate
all_class_powers.content:
## Description
It GROWS!

| LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY                                                 |
| ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 5  |
| 2     | 1      | You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 10 |
| 3     | 1      | You gain +2 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |
| 4     | 2      | You gain +4 strength every two turns of combat up to 20 |

all_sub_powers.text: You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 5
You gain +1 strength every two turns of combat up to 10
You gain +2 strength every two turns of combat up to 20
You gain +4 strength every two turns of combat up to 20

## Description I'm made of plastic! It's fantastic | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Wildshape**
-You can take the forms of animals smaller than humans but bigger than bugs. These have to be real animals | | 1 | 1 | **Changeling**
-You can take the appearance of people you have seen before | | 1 | 1 | **Natural Tools**
-You can shift your body into tools and weapons on command |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Wildshape**
-You can take the forms of animals smaller than humans but bigger than bugs. These have to be real animals

**Changeling**
-You can take the appearance of people you have seen before

**Natural Tools**
-You can shift your body into tools and weapons on command

all_class_powers.name: Thistle
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The power to fight back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | | 1 | 1 | **Shell**
-Enemies that attack you take 2 damage | | 1 | 1 | **Hunker Down**
-You can Hunker down as an action, Consuming all your movement and rooting you in place until your next turn. When in this state you gain 2 armor and when attack you deal 2 damage back. |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Shell**
-Enemies that attack you take 2 damage

**Hunker Down**
-You can Hunker down as an action, Consuming all your movement and rooting you in place until your next turn. When in this state you gain 2 armor and when attack you deal 2 damage back.

all_class_powers.name: Vampire
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Bloodsucker | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Lifesteal**
-When you deal damage to an enemy heal for 4 health |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Lifesteal**
-When you deal damage to an enemy heal for 4 health

all_class_powers.name: Action Hero
all_class_powers.description: The powers of your average action movie protagonist
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The powers of your average action movie protagonist | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Hero's Limits**
-Every 3rd shot with a gun doesn't take ammo | | 1 | 1 | **Scene Maker**
-You can kick down doors with advantage | | 1 | 1 | **Last Stand**
You survive for 1 more turn after dying | | 2 | 1 | **Winner's Stand**
You can extend your time before dying by 1 if you kill an enemy |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Hero's Limits**
-Every 3rd shot with a gun doesn't take ammo

**Scene Maker**
-You can kick down doors with advantage

**Last Stand**
You survive for 1 more turn after dying

**Winner's Stand**
You can extend your time before dying by 1 if you kill an enemy

all_class_powers.name: Assassin
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Stealth and murder based powers | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Sneak Attack**
-You deal double damage when attacking from stealth | | 1 | 1 | **Move unseen**
-You gain advantage when sneaking | | 1 | 1 | **Traceless**
-You are untraceable unless you allow otherwise | | 1 | 1 | **Corpse Dust**
-Things you kill fade to ashes before disappearing completely | | 2 | 7 | **From Dust to Dust**
-When you kill something or someone you can make them be forgotten from peoples memories |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Sneak Attack**
-You deal double damage when attacking from stealth

**Move unseen**
-You gain advantage when sneaking

**Traceless**
-You are untraceable unless you allow otherwise

**Corpse Dust**
-Things you kill fade to ashes before disappearing completely

**From Dust to Dust**
-When you kill something or someone you can make them be forgotten from peoples memories

all_class_powers.name: Boomeranger
all_class_powers.content:
## Description It always comes back | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Boomerang**
Every item you throw can be returned to you. | | 2 | 1 | **Ricochet 1**
-Thrown items hit 2 enemies in range before returning |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Boomerang**
Every item you throw can be returned to you.

**Ricochet 1**
-Thrown items hit 2 enemies in range before returning

all_class_powers.name: Parry
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The power to get good | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | | ----- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --- | | 1 | 1 | **Basic Parry**
You can completely block an attack if you make a reflex check equal to the enemy roll -4 | | | 2 | 1 | **Reflect**
If you roll 2 higher than the enemy they take half the damage the attack would have done. | |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Basic Parry**
You can completely block an attack if you make a reflex check equal to the enemy roll -4

**Reflect**
If you roll 2 higher than the enemy they take half the damage the attack would have done.

all_class_powers.name: Swordsman
all_class_powers.content:
## Description The way of the sword | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Blade Warrior**
-You gain +2 to hit and damage when attacking with a bladed melee weapon | | 2 | 1 | **Blade Master**
-You gain advantage when attacking with a bladed weapon |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Blade Warrior**
-You gain +2 to hit and damage when attacking with a bladed melee weapon

**Blade Master**
-You gain advantage when attacking with a bladed weapon

all_class_powers.name: Wielder
all_class_powers.content:
## Description Powers for using items better | LEVEL | POINTS | ABILITY | | ----- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | 1 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 1**
-Items you touch gain 4 armour for 5 minutes | | 2 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 2**
-Items you touch gain 8 armour for 5 minutes | | 3 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 3**
-Items you touch gain 12 armour for 5 minutes | | 4 | 1 | **Unbreakable Weapon 4**
-Items you touch gain 16 armour for 5 minutes |

all_sub_powers.text:
**Unbreakable Weapon 1**
-Items you touch gain 4 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 2**
-Items you touch gain 8 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 3**
-Items you touch gain 12 armour for 5 minutes

**Unbreakable Weapon 4**
-Items you touch gain 16 armour for 5 minutes
